attributes.action: Ban the British National Party from carrying out public events
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British National Party have been, for a long time, carrying out public events and promoting racial hatred and segregation in society. I as a citizen want to maintain and further improve the multicultural society we live in and want to prevent people from being misinformed, radicalised and have discrimination as well as racial hatred instigated in them.
